instructions:
In a 4 quart saucepan sauté the celery in olive oil for 5 minutes. Add the green pepper and continue for
another 5 minutes, and finally add the onion and continue sautéing for a final 5 minutes. Add the remaining
ingredients and simmer uncovered for 1 hour. Serve over your favorite pasta. Makes about 4 cups. 
*(Rev.
9/15/92)*

If using fresh plum tomatoes, obtain about 2 1/2 lbs or about 20 average sized plum tomatoes. Cut them
in half and remove the core. Then place flesh side down on a Pamed, rimmed baking sheet. Place in a 350 F
oven for 12 minutes. Wearing rubber gloves pinch off the skins.
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) Italian style tomato sauce
name: Marinara Sauce
creator: Nathalie Dupree
